segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman totally absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate so meticulously, apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€”water's pouring out everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it or feel the wet floor under her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is getting bigger, and it's right by her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to ruin the cabinets if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids are up to no good over there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that shaky stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and hurts himself?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, hand out like she deserves one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be sneaking treats like that without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet makes it look even more precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks perfect, untouched by this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the adult is oblivious to all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
